alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...An area of heavy rain will impact portions of north central Carroll, southeastern Jo Daviess and western Stephenson Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain near Freeport, moving east at 20 mph. Another strong storms was located near Pleasant Valley in southern Jo Daviess county, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, minor flooding and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Slowing or redirecting of traffic due to ponding or flowing water. Closure of waterfront access due to flooding. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Lena, Pearl City, Cedarville, Massbach, Loran, Kent, Eleroy, Red Oak, Damascus, Scioto Mills, Willow, and Elmoville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
